title: Development Lead
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To guide the technical direction of development projects, mentor the development team, and ensure the delivery of high-quality software solutions by bridging strategic planning with hands-on development and balancing technical leadership with people management.
responsibilities: Lead and coordinate the work of developers across one or more project teams
Define technical standards, coding practices, and architectural guidelines
Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to quality standards
Collaborate with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Identify and mitigate technical risks throughout the development lifecycle
Mentor and support the professional growth of team members
Contribute to estimation, planning, and resource allocation
Escalate issues and blockers to project or program leadership as needed
qualifications: 7+ years of software development experience
2+ years of experience in a technical leadership or team lead role
Strong understanding of software architecture and design patterns
Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Proven ability to mentor and develop junior team members
Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities

title: Senior Developer
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To design, develop, and maintain complex software systems while providing technical guidance to other developers, leading the implementation of significant features, and contributing to technical decisions that shape the team's direction.
responsibilities: Design and implement complex features and system components
Write clean, efficient, well-documented, and testable code
Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
Contribute to architectural decisions and technical documentation
Collaborate with Business Analysts and QA to clarify requirements and ensure quality
Support and mentor junior and mid-level developers
Participate in sprint planning, estimation, and retrospectives
qualifications: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Deep proficiency in one or more programming languages and frameworks
Strong understanding of software design principles and patterns
Experience with version control, CI/CD pipelines, and development tools
Ability to work independently and drive tasks to completion
Strong analytical and debugging skills
Effective communication skills for technical and non-technical audiences

title: Developer
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To build and maintain software applications according to specifications, write quality code, fix defects, and contribute to the ongoing improvement of the product while working collaboratively within a team environment.
responsibilities: Develop, test, and maintain software features based on requirements
Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
Participate in code reviews and incorporate feedback
Identify and fix bugs and performance issues
Collaborate with team members to understand requirements and deliver solutions
Document code and technical processes as required
Continuously learn and apply new technologies and best practices
Participate in Agile ceremonies including stand-ups, planning, and retrospectives
qualifications: 2+ years of software development experience
Proficiency in at least one programming language
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
Understanding of basic software development principles
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies

title: Business Analyst
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To serve as the bridge between business stakeholders and the technical team by eliciting, analysing, and documenting requirements that ensure delivered solutions meet business needs and provide measurable value.
responsibilities: Gather and document business requirements through stakeholder interviews, workshops, and analysis
Translate business needs into clear functional specifications and user stories
Create and maintain documentation including process flows, use cases, and acceptance criteria
Collaborate with developers and QA to clarify requirements and resolve ambiguities
Facilitate communication between business stakeholders and technical teams
Support user acceptance testing and validate that solutions meet requirements
Identify opportunities for process improvement and system enhancements
Manage requirement changes and maintain traceability throughout the project
qualifications: 3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in software development environments
Strong skills in requirements elicitation and documentation
Experience with Agile methodologies and writing user stories
Proficiency with business analysis tools and documentation software
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities
Ability to manage multiple priorities and stakeholder relationships

title: QA Tester
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To ensure software quality by designing and executing test cases, identifying defects, and verifying fixes while working closely with developers and Business Analysts to validate that delivered products meet quality standards.
responsibilities: Develop and execute test cases based on requirements and specifications
Perform functional, regression, and exploratory testing
Log defects with clear, reproducible steps and supporting evidence
Verify bug fixes and perform re-testing as needed
Collaborate with developers to understand features and identify edge cases
Participate in requirement reviews to identify testability concerns early
Maintain and update test documentation and test data
Report on testing progress, coverage, and defect metrics
qualifications: 2+ years of experience in software quality assurance or testing
Knowledge of software testing methodologies and the software development lifecycle
Experience with defect tracking and test management tools
Strong attention to detail and analytical skills
Ability to write clear and comprehensive test cases
Good communication skills for reporting issues effectively
Basic understanding of programming concepts is an advantage

title: QA Lead
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To oversee the quality assurance process across projects by defining testing strategies, coordinating the QA team, ensuring consistent quality standards, and driving continuous improvement in testing processes and best practices.
responsibilities: Define and implement QA strategies, standards, and processes
Plan and coordinate testing activities across project phases
Lead and mentor the QA team, assigning tasks and reviewing work
Collaborate with Development Leads and Business Analysts on quality requirements
Establish and track QA metrics to measure effectiveness and coverage
Identify opportunities for test automation and process improvement
Manage defect triage and prioritisation with stakeholders
Report on overall quality status and risks to project leadership
Ensure testing environments and data are properly maintained
qualifications: 5+ years of experience in software quality assurance
2+ years in a QA leadership or supervisory role
Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and best practices
Experience with both manual and automated testing approaches
Excellent organisational and planning skills
Strong communication and stakeholder management abilities
Ability to analyse quality metrics and drive data-informed decisions
Experience working in Agile development environments

title: UI/UX Designer
companyInfo: [Company Name] is a [industry/sector] organisation committed to delivering innovative solutions that [value proposition]. We foster a collaborative and inclusive workplace where talented individuals can grow, contribute, and make a meaningful impact. Our team is dedicated to excellence, continuous improvement, and creating value for our customers and stakeholders.
roleObjective: To create intuitive, engaging, and accessible user experiences by conducting user research, designing interfaces, and collaborating with developers to ensure products are both visually appealing and highly usable.
responsibilities: Conduct user research, interviews, and usability testing to inform design decisions
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Design intuitive user interfaces that align with brand guidelines and accessibility standards
Collaborate with Business Analysts to understand user needs and requirements
Work closely with developers to ensure accurate implementation of designs
Develop and maintain design systems and component libraries
Iterate on designs based on user feedback and testing results
Stay current with UI/UX trends, tools, and best practices
Present and justify design decisions to stakeholders
qualifications: 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design for digital products
Proficiency with design tools (e.g., Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)
Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centred design process and outcomes
Understanding of accessibility standards and responsive design principles
Experience creating wireframes, prototypes, and design specifications
Knowledge of front-end capabilities and constraints
Excellent visual design skills including typography, colour, and layout
Strong communication and presentation skills
Ability to receive and incorporate feedback constructively
